= Libraries =

To install pyaejokuaa you need to have installed the following libraries:
  * [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/DateTime DateTime] (zopeinterface)
  * [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/configobj configobj]
  * [http://effbot.org/librarybook/datetime.htm datetime]
  * [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/Elixir elixir]
  * [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/PyGObject gobject]
  * pango
  * [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/paramiko paramiko]
  * [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/PyGTK pygtk]
  * tarfile

== Debian ==
=== Packages ===
{{{
python-zopeinterface
python-configobj
python-elixir
python-gobject
python-tz
python-paramiko
python-vte
subversion
}}}

=== Packages ===
{{{
net-zope/zope-interface
dev-python/paramiko
dev-python/configobj

dev-python/pygobject
dev-python/pygtk
dev-python/pytz
